member.name: ID3D12DebugDevice1.GetDebugParameter
member.summary: Gets optional device-wide Debug Layer settings.
member.param: Specifies a value that indicates which debug parameter data to set.
Points to the memory that will be filled with a copy of the debug parameter data. The interpretation of this data depends on the given in the Type parameter.
Size in bytes of the memory buffer pointed to by pData.
member.returns: This method returns one of the Direct3D 12 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D12DebugDevice1.ReportLiveDeviceObjects
member.summary: Specifies the amount of information to report on a device object's lifetime.
member.param: A value from the enumeration. This method uses the value in Flags to determine the amount of information to report about a device object's lifetime.
member.returns: This method returns one of the Direct3D 12 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D12DebugDevice1.SetDebugParameter
member.summary: Modifies the D3D12 optional device-wide Debug Layer settings.
member.param: Specifies a value that indicates which debug parameter data to get.
Size in bytes of the data pointed to by pData.
member.returns: This method returns one of the Direct3D 12 Return Codes.
